April 29, 2025 - Hanwha Vision (Korean: 한화비전; RR: Hanhwa Bijeon), founded as Samsung Techwin, is a video surveillance company. It is a subsidiary of Hanwha Group. The company employs 1,822 people and is headquartered in South Korea. Its total sales in 2020 were 529.8 billion South Korean won.
